testimonials.name: Angela R.
testimonials.text: Bright Spark Electric rewired our entire 1960s home. They were meticulous about everything — clean work, labeled breakers, and passed inspection first try.

testimonials.name: Steven C.
testimonials.text: Had a circuit breaker that kept tripping. Bright Spark Electric found the root cause — an overloaded circuit from a bad renovation. Fixed it properly and explained everything.

testimonials.name: Diana F.
testimonials.text: Installed landscape lighting and outdoor outlets for our patio remodel. The design was beautiful and everything works perfectly. Very detail-oriented team.

testimonials.name: Ray T.
testimonials.text: Power went out in half the house during a monsoon. Bright Spark Electric came out same day, found a damaged breaker, and had us back up in no time.

testimonials.name: Linda S.
testimonials.text: Installed a Tesla Wall Connector and upgraded our panel to handle it. Bright Spark Electric handled the permit, install, and inspection. Seamless experience.
